summary: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of the tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.
cast: Jack Hawkins|Joan Collins|Dewey Martin|Alexis Minotis|James Robertson Justice|Luisella Boni|Sydney Chaplin|James Hayter|Kerima|Piero Giagnoni|Ferruccio Amendola|Gianfranco Bellini|Val√©rie Camille|Diego Carlisi|Carlo D'Angelo|Vittoria Febbi|David Muss|The Paul Steffan Dancers|Bud Thompson
title: Tierra de faraones
